title: Critique my type driven site
content:
Hello All!

I am new to the site and have taken an interest in typography and information design. I just completed a website for a musician and wanted to get the community's feedback.

her site is [http://hannahlindroth.org](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418215555/http:/hannahlindroth.org/)

All constructive criticisms are welcome. Thanks!

Sheraz
author: sheraz

comments.content: the fact that any click on the first page redirects you to a site with a different format is troubling. there can easily be a way to accomodate the rest of the pages in the same structure as the homepage. and as far as the typefaces are concerned, (its stupid to be so specific, but still) i'd probably like to see, links in trebuchet with text in georgia.
I love the first page. LOVE! But I think the other pages need to follow that design more. They don't seem very connected to the first page.
